resources.string: Please enter the following details for confirmation before requesting for your password reset email.

Note: 
 Password must have at least: 
 One special character(!"#$%&'()*+,-./:;<=>?@[]^_`{|}~),
 One uppercase character, 
 One lowercase character, 
 One number, and 
 have an overall length of between 13 and 99 characters.
